name: ICSD 2024 : 12th International Conference on Sustainable Development Rome, Italy
content: The International Conference on Sustainable Development is organized by the European Center of Sustainable Development in collaboration with CIT University. The 12th ICSD 2024 is inspired from the critical challenge of human, environmental, and economic sustainability concerning the present and future generations in a global-scale context. The Conference theme is: "Creating a unified foundation for the Sustainable Development: research, practice and education".
